abstract.para:
Note: This document lists changes only since the 1.76.0 release. If you instead want a record of the complete list of changes for the codebase over its entire history, you can obtain one by running the following commands:
svn checkout https://docbook.svn.sourceforge.net/svnroot/docbook/trunk/xsl svn log --xml --verbose xsl > ChangeHistory.xml

sect1.title: Release Notes: 1.76.1
sect1.para: The following is a list of changes that have been made since the 1.76.0 release.

sect2.title: Common
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the common code since the 1.76.0 release.

screen.phrase: Added eu.xml and gl.xml to SOURCES.
Fixed bug when context was lost due to usage of xsl:key

sect2.title: FO
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the fo code since the 1.76.0 release.

screen.phrase: Apply patch to support named destination in fop1.xsl, per Sourceforge bug report #3029845.
Remove the namespace mistakingly added with the last upload.

sect2.title: HTML
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the html code since the 1.76.0 release.

screen.phrase: Implementing handling for <b> and <i>: transform to <strong> and <em> for XHTML outputs and do not use in the highliting output (per Mauritz Jeanson)

sect2.title: Epub
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the epub code since the 1.76.0 release.

screen.phrase: Bugfix for [#3071521] to ensure that NCX navPoints are generated for d:book root nodes with the -NS version of the stylesheets
Normalizing identifier lookup between NCX and OPF
Only copy images once for the DocBook to EPUB tool to correct Windows bug reported in [#3065489]

sect2.title: Webhelp
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the webhelp code since the 1.76.0 release.

screen.phrase: Removed cruft from before webhelp indexer refactoring
Refactoring webhelp to separate more cleanly the xsl and java code.
Refactoring webhelp to separate more cleanly the xsl and java code.
Refactoring webhelp to separate more cleanly the xsl and java code.
Merged in changes from webhelp branch to address issue #3058244 regarding the xx.html temp file that was being created
